thread.title: Charity gifts beauty products to those fleeing violence
thread.title_full: Charity gifts beauty products to those fleeing violence

title: Charity gifts beauty products to those fleeing violence
text: 'It helped rebuild my confidence': Domestic violence survivor starts charity gifting beauty products to women fleeing abusive relationships... after a body wash helped her through her own trauma Jen Armstrong, 35, left her abusive relationship with her 10-month-old daughter The Sydney woman was gifted an expensive shower gel from a support charity She says it is the first thing that began to rebuild her self confidence Now, she runs the Beauty Bank, which creates bags of brand name toiletries The bags are gifted to people who have fled domestic violence situations
